articles.description: Orange County supervisors triggered widespread misunderstanding Tuesday adopting a set of voluntary guidelines for businesses that they were allowing businesses to re-open, when in fact they were not and acknowledge they have no power to do so.

articles.title: Rana Zoe Mungin: Brooklyn teacher dies of COVID-19 after ER refusals - Business Insider - Business Insider
articles.description: Rana Zoe Mungin died after a month on a ventilator. The first two times she went to the hospital she was sent home without being tested.
articles.content:
A 30-year-old Brooklyn teacher died of the novel coronavirus on Monday after being twice sent home from the hospital without being tested.

articles.title: South Africa's HIV failures cost more than 300,000 lives. Now this painful past is helping in Covid-19 fight. - CNN
articles.description: When President Trump mused about injecting household disinfectants as treatment for Covid-19 in the White House briefing room, South Africans were reminded of their own dark past.

articles.title: A couple who had been together for 73 years died hours apart from coronavirus - WAPT Jackson
articles.description: They had beds next to each other and got to say "I love you" to each other one last time before they died.
articles.content:
